name: Slender Man: The Arrival
description: Slender Man is a fictional supernatural character that originated as a creepypasta Internet meme created by Something Awful forum user Eric Knudsen in 2009. He is depicted as a thin, unnaturally tall humanoid with a featureless head and face, wearing a black suit.
creator: TP6DvETy8HmRbZWrLLDJFkjA19oe16UBPq
